      abstract void RestMethodHandler.checkArgumentsCorrectness(HttpRestHandler handler, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode arguments, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode result)
      Check the arguments correctness, called before any BODY elements but after URI and HEADER.
      static String HttpRestHandler.computeBaseAuthent(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode arguments, String extraKey)
      for instance, if X-AUTH is included
      check if in uri or header, X-AUTH is present and check X-AUTH argument (known, any key if present)
      then get timestamp and check is correct (|curtime - timestamp| < maxinterval)
      then get all uri args in alphabetic lower case order
      hash using SHA-1 all args (in order including timestamp)
      compare sha-1 hashedkey with the computed one
      protected void HttpRestHandler.createDecoder()
      Create the decoder
